item.title: Cooperation Strategies
item.description: Link Introduction For this week’s blog post, I look at the performance of my six selected cooperation strategies when played in a repetitive, round-robin style tournament and what the results may suggest about cooperation between humans. I select appeaser, foolMeOnce, majorityScrounger, retaliater, titfortat, and winStayer as playing strategies and set them against each other over 100 repeated rounds each. Link Data Details *File Name: prisoners_dilemma_data.csv *Source: Shiny app developed by Simon Garnier and edited slightly by the TF team.
